Since novices also commonly mismatch brackets, one of the sets of brackets in the if statement could be unbalanced in one of the input statements. To add logical errors, the program could be refactored to check for the incorrect total. References to 9000 in the if statement condition and resulting print statement could be subtly changed to 900.
